TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Sudan, title = Sudan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sudan} }

S.FORM: Sudan ((Faylo:Sudan highlighted.svg|thumb|Sudan in dark green, disputed regions in light green.)) Itini i 15 00 N, 30 00 E, noAfilika ko Sudan. Polong no sekalay i 1,861,484 sq km "saka 16 ko rayray no ngangan. " Polong i 36,729,501 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 100%, Malo no kilakilangan a sera 0%, malo no roma to a sera 0%. siyoto O (((Khartoum)) ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakacecay 1 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Omar al-Bashir, patirengan a romi'ad i 1993 a miheca saka 10 folad saka 16 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA 外交部

Sodan ((Faylo:Sodan highlighted.svg|thomb|Sodan in dark green, dispoted regions in light green.)) Itini i 15 00 N, 30 00 E, noAfilika ko Sodan. Polong no sekalay i 1,861,484 sq km "saka 16 ko rayray no ngangan. " Polong i 36,729,501 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 100%, Malo no kilakilangan a sera 0%, malo no roma to a sera 0%. siyoto O (((Khartoom)) ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakacecay 1 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Omar al-Bashir, patirengan a romi'ad i 1993 a miheca saka 10 folad saka 16 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA 外交部
